title: Dean's Distinguished Endowed Lecture Series Fund In Honor of Richard Hamman, MD, MPH, DrPH
description: To provide support for an annual lecture series, in honor of Richard Hamman, MD, MPH, DrPH within the Colorado School of Public Health at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.
marketingContent: To provide support for an annual lecture series, in honor of Richard Hamman, MD, MPH, DrPH within the Colorado School of Public Health at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.
